text: mariyu mi vijayadhananlo niscayanga, ayidava bhagam, allah mariyu ayana pravaktaku mariyu (atani) daggari bandhuvulaku mariyu anadhulaku mariyu yacincani pedavariki mariyu prayanikulaku undani telusukondi, okavela miru - allah nu mariyu memu satyasatyala antaranni visadam cese dinamuna, a rendu sain'yalu markonina (badr yud'dha) dinamuna, ma dasunipai avatarimpajesina danini - visvasincevare ayite! Mariyu allah pratidi ceyagala samardhudu
